properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: domainid
properties.description:
(String, Required) The domain id to add the
record to

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the record type

properties.name: value
properties.description: • the record value - (Required) The value of the record; its usage will depend on the type (see below)

properties.name: ttl
properties.description: (Integer, Optional) The TTL of the record gtdLocation
Additional arguments are listed below under DNS Record Types.

properties.name: dns-record-types
properties.description: » DNS Record Types

The type of record being created affects the interpretation of the value argument; also, some additional arguments are required for some record types. http://help.dnsmadeeasy.com/tutorials/managed-dns/ has more information.

properties.name: a-record
properties.description: » A Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the hostname

properties.name: cname-record
properties.description: » CNAME Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the alias name

properties.name: aname-record
properties.description: » ANAME Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the aname target

properties.name: mx-record
properties.description: » MX Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the server

properties.name: mxLevel
properties.description: (Integer, Required) is the MX level

properties.name: httpred-record
properties.description: » HTTPRED Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the URL

properties.name: hardLink
properties.description:
(Boolean, Optional) If true, any request that is
made for this record will have the path removed after the
fully qualified domain name portion of the requested URL

properties.name: redirectType
properties.description: (Required) One of 'Hidden Frame Masked', 'Standard 301', or 'Standard 302'

properties.name: title
properties.description: (Optional) If set, the hidden iframe that is used in conjunction with the Hidden Frame Masked Redirect Type will have the HTML meta description data field set to the value of this field

properties.name: keywords
properties.description: (Optional) If set, the hidden iframe that is used in conjunction with the Hidden Frame Masked Redirect Type will have the HTML meta keywords data field set to the value of this field

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) A human-readable description.

properties.name: txt-record
properties.description: » TXT Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is free form text

properties.name: spf-record
properties.description: » SPF Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the SPF definition of hosts allowed to send email

properties.name: ptr-record
properties.description: » PTR Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the reverse DNS for the host

properties.name: ns-record
properties.description: » NS Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the host name of the server

properties.name: aaaa-record
properties.description: » AAAA Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the IPv6 address

properties.name: srv-record
properties.description: » SRV Record

properties.name: value
properties.description: is the host

properties.name: priority
properties.description: (Integer, Required). Acts the same way as MX Level

properties.name: weight
properties.description:
(Integer, Required). Hits will be assigned proportionately
by weight

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Integer, Required). The actual port of the service offered
